description: Angelene is a nun of the Anieze Forces and Luccia`s partner. Angelene and Luccia as a pair is almost always with Anieze after the Queen of Adriatic incident. She is slightly shorter than her partner with longer, braided hair. She seems to be quite shy in contrast to her partner, though her personality at times can be childish, and she does get angry. She has a real sweet tooth for various deserts and sweet drinks. Her magic revolves around a bag she carries around, which is reference to a passage in Matthew`s Gospel and gold.
name: Angelene
